scripts.deep-clean: rimraf client/angular/node_modules client/angular/package-lock.json client/core/node_modules client/core/package-lock.json node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run deep-clean
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:core && npm run install:angular
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:angular
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:angular
scripts.bt: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.ibt: npm run install:all && npm run bt
